ods noproctitle;
ods graphics / imagemap=on;

proc glmselect data=WORK.IMPORT outdesign(addinputvars)=Work.reg_design 
		plots=(criterionpanel);
	model USGDPYearOverYearPCTChng=Mining_and_logging Construction Manufacturing 
		Wholesale_trade Retail_trade Transportation_and_warehousing Utilities 
		Information Financial_activities Professional_and_business_servic 
		Education_and_health_services Leisure_and_hospitality Other_services 
		Government Federal_government State_government Local_government / showpvalues 
		selection=stepwise
    
   (select=sbc);
run;

proc reg data=Work.reg_design alpha=0.05 plots(only)=(diagnostics residuals 
		observedbypredicted);
	ods select DiagnosticsPanel ResidualPlot ObservedByPredicted;
	model USGDPYearOverYearPCTChng=&_GLSMOD /;
	run;
quit;

proc delete data=Work.reg_design;
run;
